outputs.output_descr:
In line with the UNDAF, the mission mandates of UNMIS and UNAMID, and the UN and Partners Humanitarian Work Plan,
the central aim of this project is to strengthen the United Nation's capacity to coordinate efforts to consolidate peace and
stability. The project strengthens coordination capacity to support stabilization, early recovery and development. The
project also includes support for localized emergencies in states where RCSO is present. This project, which spans for two
years, builds on the coordination architecture established for Darfur, the East, the Three Areas and Southern Sudan. Human resource expenditure in North Sudan (Darfur, East, Three Areas, Khartoum) will be covered by project 00072553.

In line with the UNDAF, the mission mandates of UNMIS and UNAMID, and the UN and Partners Humanitarian Work Plan, the central aim of this project is to strengthen the United Nation's capacity to coordinate efforts to consolidate peace and stability. The project strengthens coordination capacity to support stabilization, early recovery and development. The project also includes support for localized emergencies in states where RCSO is present. This project, which spans for two years, builds on the coordination architecture established for Darfur, the East, the Three Areas and Southern Sudan. Operational expenditure (excl. payroll) in North Sudan (Darfur, East, Three Areas, Khartoum) will be covered by project 00072556.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

project_title: Support to the Strengthening of the RC System in Sudan
